long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
uwuify-doer allows you to turn text on any site you visit into uwu-speak! (turns letters L and R into W's, N's into "Ny", etc.)

uwuify-doer features tons of customization including:
- A whitelist so you can disable automatic uwu on sites you don't want to uwuify!
- Easily turn on or off a perma-uwu mode to uwuify sites automatically!
- Extension themes
- A manual uwu mode for:
-> uwuifying text you type
-> uwuifying new content that's loaded in
-> uwuifying pages individually

This project is open-source and on Github! (https://github.com/willowyx/uwuify-doer)
